page.title: 19LOCAL AND WIDER ENVIRONMENT
page.content:
HOUGHTON REGIS UPPER SCHOOL
Education also takes place outside and beyond the school buildings and grounds. As part of their studies pupils regulary visit and work at places with geographical, historical, scientific, comercial, sociological and natural interest. Some of these are nearby and can be visited in a morning or afternoon.
For other field work or residential courses pupils stay at palces further afield e.g. the Peak district, North Wales, and Nether Swell which is in Gloucestershire etc. These are a regular feature of school life.
